mapper.select: SELECT A.UserID, A.UserCode, A.MailAddress, A.BirthDiv, A.IsBirthLeapMonth, A.BirthDate, A.ExternalMailAddress, A.Mobile, A.Fax, A.PhoneNumberInter, A.IPPhone, A.PhoneNumber, A.PhotoFileID AS updateFileId, A.DisplayName, B.CompanyName, B.DeptName, B.JobPositionName, B.JobTitleName, C.Mail, D.AbsenseUseYN, D.AbsenseDuty , IF(D.AbsenseTermStart, DATE_FORMAT(D.AbsenseTermStart, '%Y.%m.%d'), '') AS AbsenseTermStart , IF(D.AbsenseTermEnd, DATE_FORMAT(D.AbsenseTermEnd, '%Y.%m.%d'), '') AS AbsenseTermEnd , D.AbsenseReason, D.AbsenseType, IF (D.AbsenseDuty IS NULL, '', CONCAT(D.AbsenseDuty,';',(SELECT DisplayName FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user E WHERE D.AbsenseDuty = E.UserCode))) AS absenseDutyText, PhotoPath AS updateFilePath , ChargeBusiness AS ChargeBusiness , D.PushAllowYN , D.PushAllowWeek , D.PushAllowStartTime , D.PushAllowEndTime FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user A JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup B ON A.UserCode = B.UserCode LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_google C ON A.UserCode = C.UserCode LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_info D ON A.UserCode = D.UserCode WHERE B.UserCode = #{userCode} AND B.Seq = #{seq}

SELECT Seq ,UserCode ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiCompanyName) AS CompanyName ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiDeptName) AS DeptName ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiJobLevelName) AS JobLevelName ,CompanyCode ,DeptCode ,JobLevelCode FROM sys_object_user_basegroup WHERE 1=1 AND UserCode = #{userCode}
ORDER BY JobType <> 'Origin'

SELECT Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, SOU.MultiDisplayName) AS UR_Name ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, SOUBG.MultiDeptName) AS DeptName ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, SOUBG.MultiJobLevelName) AS JobLevelName ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, SOUBG.JobPositionName) AS JobPositionName ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, SOUBG.JobTitleName) AS JobTitleName ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, SOUBG.MultiCompanyName) AS CompanyName FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user SOU LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup AS SOUBG ON (SOUBG.UserCode = SOU.UserCode) WHERE SOUBG.Seq = #{seq}

SELECT (SELECT GroupPath FROM sys_object_group WHERE GroupCode = SOUB.DeptCode) AS GroupPath ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, SOUB.MultiDeptName) AS DeptName ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, SOUB.MultiJobLevelName) AS JobLevelName ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, SOUB.JobPositionName) AS JobPositionName ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, SOUB.JobTitleName) AS JobTitleName ,FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, SOUB.MultiCompanyName) AS CompanyName , (SELECT DomainID FROM sys_object_domain WHERE DomainCode = SOUB.CompanyCode) AS DomainID ,SOUB.CompanyCode AS CompanyCode ,SOUB.JobLevelCode ,SOUB.JobPositionCode ,SOUB.JobTitleCode ,SOUB.DeptCode ,covi_smart4j.sys_getFullPath(SOUB.DeptCode) AS GroupFullName ,covi_smart4j.Fn_GetApprvalDeptInfo_S(SOUB.DeptCode,'CODE') AS ApprovalParentGR_Code ,covi_smart4j.Fn_GetApprvalDeptInfo_S(SOUB.DeptCode,'NAME') AS ApprovalParentGR_Name ,SOUB.MultiJobPositionName AS UR_MultiJobPositionName ,SOUB.MultiJobTitleName AS UR_MultiJobTitleName ,SOUB.MultiJobLevelName AS UR_MultiJobLevelName ,SOUB.MultiDeptName AS GR_MultiName FROM sys_object_user_basegroup AS SOUB WHERE 1=1 AND SOUB.Seq = #{seq}
SELECT LogonPassword, REPLACE(BirthDate, '.', '') AS BirthDate, REPLACE(Mobile, '-', '') AS Mobile FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user A WHERE UserCode = #{userCode}

SELECT A.CodeID , A.BizSection , A.CodeGroup , A.Code , A.CodeName , A.MultiCodeName , A.Reserved1 AS EnableMedia -- 예비1: 모든 발송 가능 매체 , A.Reserved2 AS EditableMedia -- 예비2: 사용자가 설정 가능한 매체 , A.Reserved3 AS DefaultMedia -- 예비3: 초기설정값 , A.Description , DATE_FORMAT(A.ModifyDate,'%Y-%m-%d') AS ModifyDate , B.CodeName AS parentCodeName , B.MultiCodeName AS parentMultiCodeName , IFNULL(C.MediaType, A.Reserved3) AS MediaType , IFNULL(D.DisplayName,'Default') AS ModifyName FROM covi_smart4j.sys_base_code A LEFT JOIN (SELECT Code, CodeName, MultiCodeName FROM covi_smart4j.sys_base_code sbc WHERE codeGroup = 'TodoCategory' AND IsUse = 'Y' AND DomainID = (SELECT DomainID FROM covi_smart4j.sys_base_code WHERE Code = sbc.Code AND CodeGroup = 'TodoCategory' ORDER BY IF(DomainID = #{domainID}, 0, 1) LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY SortKey ASC ) B ON A.BizSection = B.Code LEFT JOIN (SELECT ServiceType, MediaType , ModifierCode FROM covi_smart4j.sys_messaging_setting WHERE UserCode = #{userCode} ) C ON A.Code = C.ServiceType LEFT JOIN sys_object_user D ON C.ModifierCode = D.UserCode LEFT JOIN sys_object_user_basegroup E ON E.UserCode = D.UserCode AND E.JobType = 'Origin' WHERE A.codeGroup = 'TodoMsgType' AND A.IsUse = 'Y' AND A.ReservedInt = 1 AND B.CodeName IS NOT NULL AND A.DomainID = (SELECT DomainID FROM covi_smart4j.sys_base_code WHERE Code = A.Code AND CodeGroup = 'TodoMsgType' ORDER BY IF(DomainID = #{domainID}, 0, 1) LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY A.BizSection, A.SortKey ASC
